name: 2024 The 7th International Conference on Machine Learning and Machine Intelligence
content: Publication: Accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the International Conferen ce Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1783-3), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. (\*All the previous Conference Proceedings have been archived in ACM Digital Library and have been indexed by Ei Compendex & Scopus.)
